g.com/t0184cce6f7e7d9d700.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="fengxing"]{background-image:url(http://p9.qhimg.com/d/inn/624b85b0/logo/fengxing.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="baofeng"]{background-image:url(http://p9.qhimg.com/d/inn/624b85b0/logo/baofeng.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="boosj"]{background-image:url(http://p1.qhimg.com/t01fcda6f0455421417.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="imgo"]{background-image:url(http://p2.qhimg.com/d/inn/99de45ad/mango.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="qq"]{background-image:url(http://p9.qhimg.com/d/inn/624b85b0/logo/qq.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="cztv"]{background-image:url(http://p9.qhimg.com/t014dc34689dd70a982.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="brtn"]{background-image:url(http://p4.qhimg.com/t01438a378b70a02783.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="xiankan"]{background-image:url(http://p7.qhimg.com/t01d0a254d7d5b08cd5.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="zgltv"]{background-image:url(http://p3.qhimg.com/t015515790ee31ac72b.png);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="acfun"]{background-image:url(http://p8.qhimg.com/t014d7fee73fc1047ea.jpg);}#mohe-m-tv.mh-icon-logo[data-site="bilibili"]{background-image:url(http://p2.qhimg.com/t01032e9851b6603d1b.png);}步步惊心:丽更新至7集/共20集第7集优酷优酷土豆类型：言情/古装地区：韩国主演：李准基 IU 姜河那 洪宗玄 南柱赫 边伯贤 金志洙 1-712345671-512345_loader.use('zepto',function(){varTouchStart,TouchStartX,TouchStartY,TouchTimer,IsAnimated=false,TouchView=null,scope=$('#mohe-m-tv');functioninitTouchEvent(){TouchStart=false;TouchStartX=0;TouchStartY=0;TouchTimer=null;}initTouchEvent();functioninitTouchStart(touchevent){if(touchevent.touches.length===1){varfirstTouch=touchevent.touches[0];TouchStart=true;TouchStartX=firstTouch.pageX;TouchStartY=firstTouch.pageY;}}functioninitViewStatu(views){varviewitems=views.children();viewitems.filter('.prev').removeClass('prev');viewitems.filter('.next').removeClass('next');}$('.mh-play-info',scope).on('touchstart','.mh-view-item',function(e){varself=$(this),views=self.parent();if(!IsAnimated){initViewStatu(views);self.prev().addClass('prev');self.next().addClass('next');}TouchView=views;initTouchStart(e);}).on('click','.mh-tabs>.mh-item',function(e){varself=$(this),tabs=self.parent();if(!self.hasClass('active')){varviews=tabs.parent().find('.mh-views');initViewStatu(views);self.add(views.children().eq(self.index())).addClass('active').siblings('.active').removeClass('active');}});$(document).on('touchmove',function(e){vartouches=e.touches,firstTouch=touches[0],self=$(this),pageX=firstTouch.pageX,pageY=firstTouch.pageY;/*非单指滑动退出*/if(!TouchStart||touches.length>1){return;}/*模拟触发touchend*/if(TouchTimer){clearTimeout(TouchTimer);}TouchTimer=setTimeout(function(){if(Math.abs(pageX-TouchStartX)>5&&Math.abs(pageX-TouchStartX)>Math.abs(pageY-TouchStartY)){vardirection=pageX>TouchStartX?"Right":'Left';self.trigger('swipe'+direction);}initTouchEvent();TouchView=null;},50);/*阻止浏览器默认跳转历史记录页*/if(TouchView&&TouchView.length&&Math.abs(pageX-TouchStartX)>Math.abs(pageY-TouchStartY)){e.preventDefault();}}).on('touchstart',function(e){vartarget=$(e.target);if(target.closest('#mohe-m-tv').length&&target.closest('.mh-view-item').length===0){/*当手指点击非view时*/TouchView=null;}}).on('swipeLeftswipeRight',function(e){if(TouchView&&TouchView.length&&TouchStart&&!IsAnimated){vartype=e.type,interval=300,views=TouchView,next=views.children('.next'),prev=views.children('.prev'),active=views.children('.active'),tabs=views.closest('.mh-play-list').find('.mh-tabs'),select=views.closest('.mh-play-list').find('.mh-sel-no-list');if(type==='swipeLeft'&&next.length){IsAnimated=true;views.animate({'left':'-100%'},interval,'ease-out',function(){views.css('left',0);next.removeClass('next').addClass('active');active.removeClass('active');if(tabs.length){tabs.children('.active').removeClass('active').next().addClass('active');}if(select.length){select.val(next.data('index')).trigger('change',[true]);}initTouchEvent();IsAnimated=false;TouchView=null;});}elseif(type==='swipeRight'&&prev.length){IsAnimated=true;views.animate({'left':'100%'},interval,'ease-out',function(){views.css('left',0);prev.removeClass('prev').addClass('active');active.removeClass('active');if(tabs.length){tabs.children('.active').removeClass('active').prev().addClass('active');}if(select.length){select.val(prev.data('index')).trigger('change',[true]);}initTouchEvent();IsAnimated=false;TouchView=null;});}}});$('.mh-sel-site-list',scope).on('change',function(){varself=$(this),secopt=$(this.options[this.selectedIndex]),sitename=$.trim(secopt.text()),siteen=self.val(),choose=self.parent().find('.mh-sel-site'),site=choose.children('.mh-site-name'),securl=secopt.data('url'),list=$('.mh-play-list[data-site="'+siteen+'"]'),logo=choose.children('.mh-icon-logo'),playlink=$('.js-mh-play-link',scope);site.text(sitename);parent=list.parent();logo.data('site',siteen);list.parent().children().hide();list.show();if(playlink.data('zhibo')!=1){playlink.attr('href',securl);}if(typeofPageLine!=='undefined'&&typeofPageLine.fill==='function'){PageLine.fill({'cat':'m-video_story-moni','data-md':'sel-site'});}});$('.mh-sel-no-list',scope).on('change',function(e,disview){varself=$(this),index=self.val(),option=$(this.options[this.selectedIndex]),sel=self.parent().find('.mh-sel-no'),views=self.closest('.mh-play-list').find('.mh-views'),viewitems=views.children();if(disview===true){}else{initViewStatu(views);viewitems.filter('.active').removeClass('active');viewitems.filter('[data-index="'+index+'"]').addClass('active');}sel.text(option.text());});});
